2.1.2.1.12. date_time.UTC¶

class date_time.UTC¶

Date-times in DataONE are required to have timezone information that is fixed to UTC. A naive Python datetime can be fixed to UTC by attaching it to this tzinfo based class.

__init__()¶

x.__init__(...) initializes x; see x.__class__.__doc__ for signature

Methods

dst(dt)¶
fromutc()¶

datetime in UTC -> datetime in local time.

tzname(dt)¶
utcoffset(dt)¶
